product_title: Kindle Paperwhite, 6" High-Resolution Display (212 ppi) with Built-in Light, Wi-Fi
review_headline: I am completely satisfied with my new Paperwhite
review_body: It's everything I want in an eReader.  I had a Kindle Fire for 2 months, but it was stolen. I realized, since I have a smartphone and laptop,  all I really wanted is a reader. The most important feature for me is the backlight. I am completely satisfied with my new Paperwhite!

review_body: Very comfortable to hold as you read a great story. Would be wonderful if you could hold with one hand and change pages with the push if a button.

product_title: Kindle Paperwhite, 6" High-Resolution Display (212 ppi) with Built-in Light, Wi-Fi
review_body: Bought this right before a long trip and I am loving it!!! The paperwhite aspect is great, no glare whatsoever, and pretty easy to maneuver. It did freeze up on me once, but after a restart, it's been working fine!!

product_title: Kindle Paperwhite, 6" High-Resolution Display (212 ppi) with Built-in Light, Wi-Fi
review_body: This is a great size to slip into a purse or briefcase and I love having unlimited books/reading material at my fingertips. However, I felt the screen lags a bit when turning "pages," which surprises me. Also odd flashing occurs on the screen sometimes when it wakes up or when I change pages. Doesn't affect the readability, just an odd thing to happen. Overall, I'm very pleased with the product. I had trouble reading on the tablet, but this is much easier on my eyes.

product_title: Kindle Paperwhite, 6" High-Resolution Display (212 ppi) with Built-in Light, Wi-Fi
review_body: LOVE Kindle Paperwhite!!!  If you're a reader, getting a kindle is your ticket to the world!  Better than a library, better than a bookstore.  You'll think you went straight to book heaven!!!  Thanks Amazon!  :o)

review_body: Smooth taste. I bought this to add to my coffee in the morning and am glad I did. Package came on time and in good order. The product package is well crafted and being USDA certified organic is of great importance to me. Glad I bought this and will continue to buy when I run out.
